name: Six Shooter
desc: A special W-Engine modeled after a revolver. It can apparently load six bullet-shaped condensed Ether batteries, which release a significant amount of power when fired. It is said that as long as you carry this W-Engine, you will be able to spontaneously learn how to whistle and will occasionally reference old movies in a cowboy voice.
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A special W-Engine modeled after a revolver. It can load bullet-shaped condensed Ether batteries, which release a great amount of power when fired.
phaseDescs: The equipper gains 1 Charge stack every 3s, stacking up to 6 times. When launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, consumes all Charge stacks and each stack consumed increases the skill's Daze inflicted by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>.
